name: angry_fist_raise
description: angrily raising one fist to show irritation / aggressivnes

name: disappointed
description: leaving the shoulders and head hanging to show disappointment or exhaustednes

name: fist_bump
description: extending arm with hand as fist. expecting a fist bump in euphoria

name: head_scratch
description: Scratching your own head to express thinking or confusion

name: salut
description: Putting hand to head for a salut. expressing respect or that something was understood

name: winner_pose
description: throwing both hands in the air and putting head back. This pose can display great euphoria or anger

name: tilting_head
description: Tilting head slightly to one side to convey curiosity or confusion.

name: hand_on_hip
description: Placing one hand on the hip to convey confidence or authority.

name: palms_together
description: Bringing palms together in front of the body to express gratitude or pleading.
